## Plane.(constructor)

Construct a plane from normal and a point on the plane.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(origin: Vector3, normal: Vector3);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  origin | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The point on the plane. |
|  normal | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | Normal of the plane. |
